A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really disappointing. Lacked any understanding of physics or suspension of disbelief; had mostly pointless plots and subplots that didn't ultimately do anything to further the story but just distracted from it; a lot of forced political correctness which was too obvious not to be jarring; ignored the canon/universe it is set in\, which is why a lot of fans are upset; on that note\, they totally misunderstood both what makes Star Wars great and who their audience is (perhaps in an effort to sell more merchandise). I don't think this was a half a star movie\, however the critic reviews need to be counteracted because they are clearly compromised and dishonest.
